AT.name: Rayman® 3
AT.description: Als Globox, Raymans bester Freund, aus Versehen einen furchtbaren, schwarzen Lum verschluckt, ist das kein Weltuntergang - könnte es aber noch werden! Um eine Invasion bösartiger, ungezogener Horden im großen Stil zu vermeiden, gibt es nur eine Lösung: Rayman muss jemanden finden, der seinen lästigen Freund heilen kann.

AU.name: Rayman® 3
AU.description: When Globox, Rayman's best friend, inadvertently swallows a dreadful black Lum, it isn't the end of the world — but it could be! To prevent a full-scale invasion of malicious, ill-mannered hordes there is only one solution: Rayman must get someone to treat his burdensome pal.

BG.name: Rayman® 3
BG.description: When Globox, Rayman's best friend, inadvertently swallows a dreadful black Lum, it isn't the end of the world — but it could be! To prevent a full-scale invasion of malicious, ill-mannered hordes there is only one solution: Rayman must get someone to treat his burdensome pal.

BE.name: Rayman® 3
BE.description: Lorsque Globox, le meilleur ami de Rayman, avale par mégarde un épouvantable Lum noir, ce n'est pas la fin du monde — mais ça pourrait l'être. Pour éviter l'invasion d'une horde malicieuse, Rayman doit trouver quelqu'un pour venir en aide à son pote.

EE.name: Rayman® 3
EE.description: When Globox, Rayman's best friend, inadvertently swallows a dreadful black Lum, it isn't the end of the world — but it could be! To prevent a full-scale invasion of malicious, ill-mannered hordes there is only one solution: Rayman must get someone to treat his burdensome pal.

ES.name: Rayman® 3
ES.description: Cuando Globox, el mejor amigo de Rayman, traga accidentalmente a una desagradable y malvada criatura, no es el fin del mundo, ¡pero podría serlo! Para evitar que una horda de maldad se apodere del mundo, Rayman deberá combatir y ayudar a su corpulento amigo.

HU.name: Rayman® 3
HU.description: When Globox, Rayman's best friend, inadvertently swallows a dreadful black Lum, it isn't the end of the world — but it could be! To prevent a full-scale invasion of malicious, ill-mannered hordes there is only one solution: Rayman must get someone to treat his burdensome pal.

IT.name: Rayman® 3
IT.description: Quando Globox, il migliore amico di Rayman, inghiotte inavvertitamente un terribile Lum nero, non è la fine del mondo... ma potrebbe esserlo! Per scongiurare un'invasione di orde malvagie e maleducate c'è solo una soluzione: Rayman deve trovare qualcuno che guarisca il suo pesante amico.

LT.name: Rayman® 3
LT.description: When Globox, Rayman's best friend, inadvertently swallows a dreadful black Lum, it isn't the end of the world — but it could be! To prevent a full-scale invasion of malicious, ill-mannered hordes there is only one solution: Rayman must get someone to treat his burdensome pal.

NO.name: Rayman® 3
NO.description: When Globox, Rayman's best friend, inadvertently swallows a dreadful black Lum, it isn't the end of the world — but it could be! To prevent a full-scale invasion of malicious, ill-mannered hordes there is only one solution: Rayman must get someone to treat his burdensome pal.

NL.name: Rayman® 3
NL.description: Wanneer Globox, Raymans beste vriend, per ongeluk een verschrikkelijke zwarte Lum doorslikt, is dat niet meteen het einde van de wereld, maar daar kan het wel toe leiden! Om een grootschalige invasie van kwaadaardige, slechtgemanierde hordes te voorkomen is er maar één mogelijkheid. Rayman moet iemand vinden die zijn lastige vriend kan behandelen.

NZ.name: Rayman® 3
NZ.description: When Globox, Rayman's best friend, inadvertently swallows a dreadful black Lum, it isn't the end of the world — but it could be! To prevent a full-scale invasion of malicious, ill-mannered hordes there is only one solution: Rayman must get someone to treat his burdensome pal.

PL.name: Rayman® 3
PL.description: When Globox, Rayman's best friend, inadvertently swallows a dreadful black Lum, it isn't the end of the world — but it could be! To prevent a full-scale invasion of malicious, ill-mannered hordes there is only one solution: Rayman must get someone to treat his burdensome pal.

PT.name: Rayman® 3
PT.description: Quando o Globox, o melhor amigo do Rayman, engole um temível Lum negro sem querer, não é o fim do mundo, mas quase poderia ser! Só há uma maneira de evitar uma invasão total por parte de exércitos de Lums: o Rayman terá de encontrar alguém que trate do seu azarado companheiro.

RU.name: Rayman® 3
RU.description: Глобокс, лучший друг Рэймана, нечаянно проглатывает ужасного черного Лума. Это, конечно, еще не конец света, но может этим закончиться! Есть только одна возможность предотвратить полномасштабное нападение вредных и злобных полчищ: Рэйман должен найти лекаря для расхворавшегося приятеля.

SE.name: Rayman® 3
SE.description: When Globox, Rayman's best friend, inadvertently swallows a dreadful black Lum, it isn't the end of the world — but it could be! To prevent a full-scale invasion of malicious, ill-mannered hordes there is only one solution: Rayman must get someone to treat his burdensome pal.
